localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Use multiple camera devices to capture and create astonishing life moments with SYYNCC. Whether you’re into extreme sports, or parties, now you and your friends can use your imagination and turn the craziest video ideas into life.
blogPost.body: Use multiple camera devices to capture and create astonishing life moments with SYYNCC. Whether you’re into extreme sports, or parties, now you and your friends can use your imagination and turn the craziest video ideas into life.
blogPost.title: SYYNCC - Multicam video collage to create and share videos together
blogPost.author: Alexander Plyuto

localize.description: 使用多种摄像设备，用SYYNCC捕捉和创造令人惊叹的生活瞬间。无论你是喜欢极限运动，还是喜欢派对，现在你和你的朋友都可以发挥你的想象力，将最疯狂的视频创意变成生活。
localize.tagline: 多镜头视频拼贴，共同创建和分享视频。

localize.description: 使用多種攝像設備，用SYYNCC捕捉和創造令人驚歎的生活瞬間。無論你是喜歡極限運動，還是喜歡派對，現在你和你的朋友都可以發揮你的想象力，將最瘋狂的視頻創意變成生活。
localize.tagline: 多鏡頭視頻拼貼，共同創建和分享視頻。

previous.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
previous.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React

localize.description: Formst是一个用于在React中构建和验证表单的JavaScript库。它基于MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它简单且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作为事后考虑 "的原则上。
Formst是一個用於在React中構建和驗證表單的JavaScript庫。它基於MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它簡單且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作爲事後考慮 "的原則上。

next.excerpt: We have developed a simple web app that lets you find apps on Google Play Store that have high download numbers (100,000+) but poor rating. This is a great business opportunity for anyone who can build a better app and monetize it by providing a paid version
next.title: 1000 Business Ideas - 1000 validated app ideas

localize.description: 我们已经开发了一个简单的网络应用，让你在Google Play Store上找到下载量大（100,000+）但评分差的应用。这对于任何能够建立一个更好的应用程序并通过提供付费版本来盈利的人来说都是一个很好的商机。
我們已經開發了一個簡單的網絡應用，讓你在Google Play Store上找到下載量大（100,000+）但評分差的應用。這對於任何能夠建立一個更好的應用程序並通過提供付費版本來盈利的人來說都是一個很好的商機。
